ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: "UNION OF THE SNAKE" Part 6 of 6: The conclusion!, The United States government has already used the ultimate weapon at its disposal to strike at Cobra, but has that merely played into Cobra Commander's hands? Armed with the Tempest, he now has the ability to inflict death on biblical proportions. The Joes have seen their roster greatly diminished, and yet, they are all that stands between the world and a Cobra-led conflagration. And waiting in the shadows is a third entity, one which has the power to destroy G.I. Joe and Cobra alike...
ComicInfo.Title: Union Of The Snake (Part 6)
